data.oai_dc:dc: Excel file include responses to a 76 dB SPL target signal broadcast alone from the forward speaker, a masker broadcast alone from the forward speaker, and the 76 dB SPL target signal and masker broadcast at varied signal-to-noise ratios (-6, 0, +6 dB) from spatially grouped or separated speakers. Data plotted in figure 7C.
